channel.title: Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Python
item.description: # python哲学 输出 打印(3种输出方法) print("name is :"+name) 通过连接符 + 拼接 print("name is : %s" %name) 通过格式符 %s,%d 替换 print("name is :{}".format{name}) 通过格式化函数 format{} 格式化 引号和注释 “ ” 双引号 和
